name: Watch
description:
170CM X 90CM

2 Layer woven Jacquard beach towel

Sand resistant

3 x quick drying

Made in Bali, Indonesia

420g Weight

These towels not only dry extra quick, but they are also lightweight, travel friendly, and don't take up too much room in your beach bag. Leaving plenty of room for other essentials!

Jacquard blue Turkish Towel Woven by local artisans in Turkey, these super stylish towels are an art piece for your bathroom, poolside, or at the beach! Featuring fringe detail trim, these gorgeous towels bring quality and style together.

name: Phone
description: What is a product description? A product description is the marketing copy that explains what a product is and why it's worth purchasing. The purpose of a product description is to supply customers with important information about the features and key benefits of the product so they're compelled to buy.
